meanings.def: a person whose job is to serve customers in a shop
examples: The clerk at the counter gave me too little change.
The sales clerk answered all our questions.

meanings.def: a person whose job is dealing with people arriving at or leaving a hotel
examples: The hotel clerk greeted us warmly.

meanings.def: a person whose job is to keep the records or accounts and do other routine duties in an office, shop, etc.
examples: He started work as a railway booking clerk.
an articled clerk working for a large law firm
(especially British English) a bank clerk (= who deals with customers in a bank)

meanings.def: an official in charge of the records of a council, court, etc.
examples: a former clerk to Chief Justice George P. Willison
He held the post of Clerk to the Council.
